name: AboutMetric
description: About section with centered animated title and metric cards in a responsive grid.

title.example: At Berco Inc. we redefine innovation by empowering businesses to reach their full potential

structure.label: string - Descriptive label for the metric (required, e.g., 'Conversions', 'Partnered Brands')
structure.value: string - Metric value to display (required, e.g., '7,000+', '2018', '30+', '100M+')

metricRules.note: Provide 2-4 metrics for optimal layout. Grid automatically adjusts columns based on metric count (2 metrics = 2 cols, 3 metrics = 3 cols, 4 metrics = 4 cols). Import icons from lucide-react.

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.metrics: Array<{ icon: LucideIcon, label: string, value: string }>

dont: Do not use more than 4 items
